channel.title: 2second wait before player attacks
channel.description: well when i try to attack a npc or player my character first isnt doing anything for like 2-3seconds and after these 2seconds it attacks the npc/player. I once solved this problem months ago on a friends server but i cant remember how i did it. can someone please help me? thanks.
